hero.subtext: PixelForge gives professional photographers a seamless way to organize, share, and deliver photo collections to clients.

features.title: Everything you need to deliver
features.subtitle: From the first shot to final delivery — PixelForge handles the workflow.
features.f1Desc: Organize every shoot into a clean collection. Track status from draft to delivery at a glance.
features.f2Desc: Let clients mark their favorites directly in the gallery. No more back-and-forth emails.
features.f3Desc: Deliver final edits in a polished branded experience your clients will actually enjoy.

plans.title: Simple, honest pricing
plans.subtitle: Start for free. Upgrade when your business grows.

footer.tagline: Professional photo delivery for modern photographers.

login.title: Login
login.googleError: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.

passwordReset.forgotDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
passwordReset.successDesc: If an account exists, a reset link has been sent.
passwordReset.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordReset.expiredLink: Link expired or invalid. Request a new one.
passwordReset.successReset: Password updated! You can now log in.

register.title: Create Account
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.emailExists: An account with this email already exists.

profile.subtitle: Your profile & account settings

collections.emptyDescription: Create your first collection to start organizing and sharing your photos with clients.

collection.draftPhaseInProgress: Draft phase — upload photos and share with your client to begin.
collection.selectingPhaseInProgress: Selecting phase — your client is choosing their favourite photos.
collection.reviewPhaseInProgress: Review phase — upload your edited finals and mark as delivered.
collection.deliveredPhaseComplete: Delivered — your client can now download their photos.
collection.addPhotosDesc: Upload your photos then share the link with your client so they can start selecting.
collection.waitingForClientDesc: Your client is browsing the gallery and selecting their favourite photos.
collection.uploadFinalsHeroDesc: Your client has made their selections. Upload the edited finals and mark as delivered.
collection.readyToDeliverDesc: Share the delivery link with your client so they can download their photos.

promotional.modalDesc: May we use up to 5 photos from this collection on our homepage to showcase the quality of work done by PixelForge photographers?

actions.deleteAdminBlocked: Admin accounts cannot be deleted. Demote to USER first.

emailVerification.successDesc: Your email has been verified. You can now log in to your account.
emailVerification.errorDesc: This verification link is invalid or has already been used.
emailVerification.notVerified: Your email is not verified. Please check your inbox for the verification link.
emailVerification.resendSuccess: Verification email sent! Check your inbox.
emailVerification.checkEmailDesc: We've sent a verification link to your email. Click it to activate your account.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Notice
cookieConsent.description: We use essential cookies to keep you logged in, and optional analytics cookies (Google Analytics) to understand how you use our app and improve it.
